Key Match Events: Aaron Civale and Aaron Ashby combined on a two-hit shutout
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at American Family Field in Milwaukee, Wisconsin
The umpires were Mark Carlson, Ben May, Jordan Baker, and Stu Scheurwater
Others: The Milwaukee Brewers won the game 6-0
The San Francisco Giants lost the game 6-0
The current series is 2-1 in favor of the Brewers
